underlying_goal: Continue spec work for a proactive idea generation system by researching and validating tool/API options for research agents, then making selections
friction_detail: Perplexity API auth issues and rate limits hampered the parallel research agents, requiring fallback to general knowledge for some findings.
brief_summary: User wanted to research and compare APIs/tools for their research agents' specs; Claude ran parallel research tasks and produced a comparison sheet, but the session ended before final selections were made due to token limits.
